sentence.Network_en: For added protection choose a lipstick with a sun screen.

sentence.Network_en: In my version of the story, I added some new material.
sentence.Network_cn: 我在讲述这个故事时加入了新的素材。

sentence.Network_en: Almost as an afterthought he added that he missed her.
sentence.Network_cn: 他又几乎不假思索地补充说他想念她。

entry.def: You use added to say that something has more of a particular thing or quality.

example.ex: For added protection choose a lipstick with a sun screen.
example.tran: 选择防晒护唇膏来增强保护。

means.word_mean: 1. combined or joined to increase in size or quantity or scope;

auth_sentence.content: Dan Biggar added eight points with his boot too!
auth_sentence.res_content: Dan Biggar added eight points with his boot too!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dan Biggar added eight points with his boot too!

Sentence.sentence: For now the app is also iPad-exclusive, and though a few of these educational institutions are giving the hardware away for free, for other students who don't have such a luxury it's an added layer of cost — and an expensive one at that.
He added that he had warned Mclaughlin that three preventable accidents in one year could lead to his discharge,as indeed it should.
The RA of two years added that while some conflicts "provided more multicultural acceptance and melding (融合)," there were also "jarring cultural confrontations.
She added that she hoped to buy an iPhone for herself once prices fall.
He hoped that these added effects would encourage his audience to support local sports teams.
